feed.title: Changes for version 0.6 are being pulled into HEAD

entry.title: Changes for version 0.6 are being pulled into HEAD
entry.summary: A message was shared on IRC by Gavin Andresen regarding the development of Bitcoin version 0.6. He stated that he has been busy pulling patches into git HEAD and hopes to release a candidate 1 in a couple of weeks. He also requested anyone who is available to help with testing, code review, and other tasks to come forward. This message was directed towards those who do not frequently hang out in IRC.
